lyrics:
"Lights On Lights Out" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Lights On Lights Out" Jeah, Yeeeeeeah-uh (what's up Waka) It's Gucci Mane LaFlare nigga (Aunty I got ya) So Icy Boy nigga You know what it do nigga Shout to my goons nigga My nigga Moe holdin' me down My nigga Tae what's happnin? So Icy Boys nigga Check it or respect it fuck (What's up Dantae what's happnin down there) Pussy (Tell them niggas fuck em, throw up on a nigga, [*gag*]) Major Ice, stupid guap, always fresh nigga I'm so iced out, lights on lights out I'm so iced out, lights on lights out I'm so iced out, lights on lights out So Icy Boys bitch, we shine like a light house I'm so iced out, lights on lights out I'm so iced out, lights on lights out I'm so iced out, lights on lights out So Icy baby WELL DAMN Frost bite Klondike Polar bear neck wear Watch & ring frigidare Thirty thousand dollar ear Ice on them wheels holla Million dollar rims patna I can't talk to you... you ain't talkin' cash dollar Ice frame Ice mane I was born in Iceland Iced out glove on lookin' like Mike man Diamonds caucasian Yellow stones are Asian Black stones are African Green ones Jamaican Fifty thousand feet up, lookin' out the window Was a little turbulence but Gucci ain't scared tho So Icy G4, smokin' with the pilot Gucci's in the cockpit you know the plane private Gucci Mane island So Icy Friday Every day's a Friday I'm ballin' with So Icy (So Icy) Bitch don't respect me Bitch ain't gotta like me (Gucci) The way I check a nigga you think I work 4 Nike (just do it) Jake blue & white it remind me of a slurpee (slurpee) Blue & green stones like the tail of a mermaid (well damn) Cartoon chain cause my brain Nickelodeon (huh) Hungry like an Ethiopian I'm re-focusin' (yeeah) Independent ballin like a major, got the majors noticin' Freestyle flow, you would think a nigga wrote this shit (naw) 2007 no eviction notices (nope) Drop top Lotus's Benz's & Bentleys's (go) So Icy boys bitch tell us what the businness is Everyone's a critic But everyone ain't gettin it in (nope) Niggas in the hood mad I blow fast Get a dildo and stick it in yo own ass nigga It's Gucci Freestyling baby Dropping this hot shit man This the freestyle mixtape nigga Coming for ya'll fuck niggas Step your rap game up baby Jeah, it's Gucci So Icy Boys (pussy) if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block';
